articles.description: Aston Villa face Bayern Munich, 42 years after beating the German giants to win the European Cup.
articles.title: Aston Villa: The night the underdogs beat Bayern Munich became European champions in 1982

articles.description: Jos Buttler returns from injury to lead England on their tour of West Indies, which starts on 31 October, while leg-spinner Jafer Chohan earns his first call-up.
articles.title: England in West Indies: Jafer Chohan earns first call-up and Jos Buttler returns from injury

articles.description: Former Arsenal goakeeper Wojciech Szczesny, who retired in August, joins Barcelona until the end of the season.
articles.title: Wojciech Szczesny ends retirement to join Barcelona

articles.description: BBC Sport and data analysts CricViz unpack why England can win the Women's T20 World Cup, and what could stand in their way.
articles.title: Women's T20 World Cup preview: Why this is England's 'best chance' and how they compare to Australia and India

articles.description: Carlos Alcaraz comes from a set down to edge out world number one Jannik Sinner in a dramatic China Open final.
articles.title: China Open: Carlos Alcaraz recovers to beat Jannik Sinner in dramatic final

articles.description: Brendan Rodgers' Celtic suffer again in Europe as they fail to learn lessons of old, writes Tom English.
articles.title: Celtic: 'Brendan Rodgers' naive side fall into familiar European trap'

articles.description: Arsenal forward Bukayo Saka says "this is the year" the Gunners end their 21-year wait for a Premier League title.
articles.title: Arsenal: Bukayo Saka says 'this is the year' Gunners end long wait for Premier League title

articles.description: Von Miller will serve a four-game suspension for violating the NFL's personal conduct policy.
articles.title: Von Miller: NFL suspends Buffalo Bills star for four games

articles.description: Rory McIlroy hopes the presence at the Dunhill Links Championship of the men involved in talks aimed at ending the split in men's professional golf is a "good sign".
articles.title: Rory McIlroy: World number three to tee up with key duo involved in LIV talks

articles.description: Sturm Graz, competing in the Champions League group stage for the first time in 24, have toppled Red Bull Salzburg in Austria thanks to a clear philosophy and a focus on scouting young talents.
articles.title: Sturm Graz: How Austrians ended Red Bull's title dominance
